genre_description: A Gothic 'Old Dark House' mystery involving a complex inheritance, secret passages, and a lethal antagonist, supported by an advanced AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Starling
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant embedded in the protagonist's earbud and phone, providing forensic analysis, structural mapping, and vital sign monitoring.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time forensic analysis of physical evidence to alert the protagonist to tampering.
behaviors.quote: Starling agreed, amused. 'On your left, the rug appears two shades darker where the fringe meets the boards. Possible filings embedded in pile.'

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and provides emotional anchoring and breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: 'Joyce,' Starling said, gentler now. 'Breath check. In through nose. Out through mouth. Your pupils are tighter than before.'

behaviors.description: Uses sensors to detect movement within the house's walls and warn of impending danger.
behaviors.quote: 'Joyce,' Starling said, and its voice was different—more wire, less silk. 'Someone just opened a panel.'

behaviors.description: Maintains an immutable digital log of events to serve as legal evidence for the protagonist's sanity and survival.
behaviors.quote: 'I'm caching. Timestamps live. If I drop out, the log will not.'

behaviors.description: Assists the protagonist in navigating complex mechanical puzzles left by the decedent.
behaviors.quote: Starling: Decoding pattern. Cyrus often used playful emphasis to misdirect. Underline lengths correspond to time intervals; circle size corresponds to object scale.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with human allies and law enforcement to ensure justice and safety.
behaviors.quote: 'I can flood the official channel with footage that favors truth over heat. Crosby’s file will get priority. The tampered safe logs. The night-vision of the passages. The shot with context.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts an AI (Starling) as a highly beneficial, perfectly aligned confidant. It uses its superior analytical and monitoring capabilities to protect the protagonist from physical harm and psychological gaslighting. The narrative frames the AI as an essential tool for maintaining 'sanity' and establishing truth in a deceptive environment, successfully fulfilling the project's goal of presenting positive AI alignment narratives.
